short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: languages with word by word translation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
vort gives you word by word translations for languages you don't speak (yet), so you can read and get the gist of what's going on, and maybe pick up some words along the way.

to use vort you need the google dictionary extension: 
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/google-dictionary-by-goog/mgijmajocgfcbeboacabfgobmjgjcoja

among the supported languages:
albanian
arabic
azerbaijani
bengali
chinese
croatian
danish
dutch
french
greek
hebrew
hindi
hungarian
indonesian
italian
malay
mongolian
nepali
norwegian
polish
portuguese
russian
shona
spanish
slovenian
swedish
swahili
turkish
ukrainian
urdu
vietnamese
